data.comment: The match is underway at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium.
The first half has been concluded at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
At St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium, Pipa has been yellow-carded for the away team.
The home team have replaced Tyler Walker with Maxime Biamou. This is the first substitution made today by Mark Robins.
In the minute 75, Alex Pritchard (Huddersfield) has replaced the possibly injured Juninho Bacuna at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium.
Mark Robins (Coventry) is making a second substitution, with Julien Da Costa replacing Fankaty Dabo.
The home team replace Callum O`Hare with Ryan Giles.
Tim Robinson blows to end the match. The final score is 0-0.
Gustavo Hamer is booked for the home team.
